items.content_html: Wordly is a lightweight, offline-first Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React and Tailwind CSS that allows users to search for word definitions and bookmark favorites — all saved locally on the user's device, with no backend or database required.
items.title: alimancs/wordly: Wordly is a lightweight, offline-first Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React and Tailwind CSS that allows users to search for word definitions and bookmark favorites — all saved locally on the user's device, with no backend or database required.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Live Server for Node Js – A lightweight static file server with live reload, WebSocket support, and auto-browser refresh. Easily serve files with custom ports and watch for changes. 🚀

items.content_html: 🛡️ OWASP Vulnerability Scanner – SecureSight 🔍 A lightweight, web-based vulnerability scanner designed to detect OWASP Top 10 security risks in HTML and JavaScript code. Built for cybersecurity education and awareness, this tool helps developers identify and fix common flaws like XSS, insecure CORS, and injection vulnerabilities in real-time.
items.title: harshithaps11/Vulnalyze: 🛡️ OWASP Vulnerability Scanner – SecureSight 🔍 A lightweight, web-based vulnerability scanner designed to detect OWASP Top 10 security risks in HTML and JavaScript code. Built for cybersecurity education and awareness, this tool helps developers identify and fix common flaws like XSS, insecure CORS, and injection vulnerabilities in real-time.

items.content_html: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)
items.title: sagardewani/doggo: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
